cpu.title: L1_ITLB_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 ITLB Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 ITLB Misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_ITLB_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: L1 ITLB Miss Rate
cpu.description: The ITLB L1 Miss rate is the number of ITLB L1_Miss_L2_Hits and L1_Miss_L2_Miss divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_ITLB_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 ITLB Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 ITLB Misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_ITLB_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: L2 ITLB Miss Rate
cpu.description: The ITLB L2 Miss rate is the number of ITLB L2 Miss divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_ITLB_HIT_RATE
cpu.name: L2 ITLB Hit Rate
cpu.description: The ITLB L2 Hit rate is the number of ITLB L1_Miss_L2_Hits divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: IPC
cpu.name: Instructions Per Cycle
cpu.description: The average number of retired instructions per CPU Cycle. The lower IPC value means the application consumes more cycles due to  cache misses, branch mispredictions, pipeline stalls, I/O or any other performance bottlenecks.

cpu.title: CPI
cpu.name: Cycles Per Instruction
cpu.advice: The CPI may be too high. This could be caused due to issues like memory stalls, instruction starvation, branch misprediction or long latency instructions
cpu.description: The average number of CPU cycles consumed to retire an instruction. This metric is computed as the ratio of CYCLES_NOT_IN_HALT to RETIRED_INST event. The higher values means the application consumes more CPU cycles to retire an instruction due to high cache misses, branch mispredictions, pipeline stalls, I/O or any other bottlenecks. If the CPI values exceeds a threshold value, it will be highlighted in pink.

cpu.title: INST_PER_CALL
cpu.name: Instr per call
cpu.description: The number of retired instructions per call.

cpu.title: RETIRED_BR_INST (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Branch Instructions (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired branch instructions per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_BR_INST_RATE
cpu.name: RETIRED_BR_INST_RATE
cpu.description: The number of retired branch instructions rate. This metric is computed as retired branches divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_BR_INST_MISP (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Branch Instructions Mispredicted (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired mispredicted branches per thousand retired instructions. Branch mispredictions incur significant performance penalty and this metric value should be reduced.

cpu.title: RETIRED_BR_INST_MISP_RATE
cpu.name: Retired Branch Instructions Mispredicted Rate
cpu.description: This metric is computed as retired mispredicted branches divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_BR_INST_MISP_RATIO
cpu.name: Retired Branch Instructions Mispredicted Ratio
cpu.description: This metric is computed as retired mispredicted branches divided by the total number of retired branch instructions.

cpu.title: %RETIRED_BR_INST_MISP
cpu.name: %Retired Branch Instructions Mispredicted
cpu.description: The percentage of retired mispredicted branches with respect to the total number of retired branches.

cpu.title: RETIRED_TAKEN_BR_INST (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Taken Branch Instructions (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired taken branches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_TAKEN_BR_INST_RATE
cpu.name: Retired Taken Branch Instruction Rate
cpu.description: The number of retired taken branches rate. This metric is computed as retired taken branches divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_TAKEN_BR_INST_MISP (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Taken Branch Instructions Mispredicted (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired mispredicted taken branches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_INDIRECT_BR_INST_MISP (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Indirect Branch Instructions Mispredicted (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired indirect branches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_NEAR_RETURNS (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Near Return Instructions (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired near branches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_NEAR_RETURNS_MISP (PTI)
cpu.name: Retired Near Return Instructions Mispredicted (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of retired mispredicted near branches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_NEAR_RETURNS_MISP_RATE
cpu.name: Retired Near Return Instructions Mispredicted Rate
cpu.description: This metric is computed as retired mispredicted near returns divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: RETIRED_NEAR_RETURNS_MISP_RATIO
cpu.name: Retired Near Return Instructions Mispredicted Ratio
cpu.description: This metric is computed as retired mispredicted near returns divided by the total number of retired return  instructions.

cpu.title: L2_BTB_CORRECTION (PTI)
cpu.name: L2_BTB_CORRECTION (PTI)
cpu.description: L2 Branch Prediction Overrides Existing Prediction (speculative).

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_REQUESTS (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 DTLB Requests (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 Data Translation Lookaside buffer (DTLB) requests from load-store micro-ops.

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 DTLB Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 Data Translation Lookaside buffer (DTLB) misses from load-store micro-ops.

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_HITS (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 DTLB HITs (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 Data Translation Lookaside buffer (DTLB) Hits from load-store micro-ops.

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_REQUEST_RATE
cpu.name: L1 DTLB Request Rate
cpu.description: The DTLB request rate is the number of DC accesses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: L1 DTLB Miss Rate
cpu.description: The DTLB L1 miss rate is the number of DTLB L1 misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DTLB_HIT_RATE
cpu.name: L1 DTLB Hit Rate
cpu.description: The DTLB L1 miss rate is the number of DTLB L1 misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_DTLB_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 DTLB Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 DTLB misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_DTLB_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: L2 DTLB Miss Rate
cpu.description: The L2 DTLB miss rate is the number of L2 DTLB misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DC_ACCESSES (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Accesses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of load and store operations per thousand instructions. This counts the dispatch of single op that performs a memory load, dispatch of single op that performs a memory store, dispatch of a single op that performs a load from and store to the same memory address

cpu.title: L1_DC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache access requests due to L1 data cache misses, per thousand retired instructions. This L2 cache access requests also includes the hardware and software prefetches.

cpu.title: L1_DC_ACCESS_RATE
cpu.name: Data Cache Access Rate
cpu.description: The L1 Data Cache access rate is the number of L1 Data Cache accesses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DC_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: Data Cache Miss Rate
cpu.description: The L1 Data Cache miss rate is the number of L1 Data Cache misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DC_MISS_RATIO
cpu.name: Data Cache Miss Ratio
cpu.description: The L1 Data Cache miss ratio is the number of L1 Data Cache misses divided by the total number of L1 Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DC_MISSES
cpu.name: Data Cache Miss Percentage
cpu.description: The percentage of L2 cache access requests due to L1 data cache misses with respect to the total number of load and store operations. This also counts the hardware and software prefetches.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_ACCESSES_FROM_DC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Accesses from Data Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache access requests due to L1 data cache misses, per thousand retired instructions. This L2 cache access requests also includes the hardware and software prefetches.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_MISSES_FROM_DC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Misses from Data Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache misses from L1 data cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_HITS_FROM_DC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Hits from Data Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache hits from L1 data cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_ACCESSES_FROM_IC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Accesses from Instruction Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache access requests due to L1 instruction cache misses, per thousand retired instructions. This L2 cache access requests also includes the prefetches.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_MISSES_FROM_IC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Misses from Instruction Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache misses from L1 Instruction cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_HITS_FROM_IC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Hits from Instruction Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache hits from L1 Instruction cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_ACCESSES_FROM_L2_CACHE_HWPF (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Accesses from L2 Cache Hardware prefetches (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache access requests due to L2 Cache hardware prefetches, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_MISSES_FROM_L2_CACHE_HWPF (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Misses from L2 Cache Hardware prefetches (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache misses due to L2 Cache hardware prefetches, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_HITS_FROM_L2_CACHE_HWPF (PTI)
cpu.name: L2 Cache Hits from L2 Cache Hardware prefetches (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L2 cache hits due to L2 Cache hardware prefetches, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_ACCESSES_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: All L2 Cache Accesses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of all L2 cache access requests due to L1 Data Cache misses, L1 Instruction cache misses and L2 Cache hardware prefetches, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_MISSES_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: All L2 Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of all L2 cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: L2_CACHE_HITS_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: All L2 Cache Hits (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of all L2 cache hits, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: MISALIGNED_LOADS (PTI)
cpu.name: Misaligned Loads (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of misaligned loads per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: MISALIGNED_LOADS_RATE
cpu.name: Misaligned Loads Rate
cpu.description: The Misalign rate is the number of misaligned loads divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: MISALIGNED_LOADS_RATIO
cpu.name: Misaligned Loads Ratio
cpu.description: The Misalign ratio is the number of misaligned loads divided by the total number of DC accesses.

cpu.title: INEFFECTIVE_SW_PF (PTI)
cpu.name: Inefffective Software Prefetch (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of ineffective software prefetches per thousand instructions.

cpu.title: STLI_OTHER (PTI)
cpu.name: StliOther PTI
cpu.description: Store-to-load conflicts: A load was unable to complete due to a non-forwardable conflict with an older store. Most commonly, a load's address range partially but not completely overlaps with an uncompleted older store. Software can avoid this problem by using same-size and same-alignment loads and stores when accessing the same data. Vector/SIMD code is particularly susceptible to this problem; software should construct wide vector stores by manipulating vector elements in registers using shuffle/blend/swap instructions prior to storing to memory, instead of using narrow element-by-element stores.

cpu.title: WCB_FULLL (PTI)
cpu.name: WcbFull PTI
cpu.description: A non-cacheable store and the non-cacheable commit buffer is full.

cpu.title: IBS_IC_MISS_RATIO
cpu.name: IC Miss Ratio
cpu.description: IBS_IC_MISS_RATIO

cpu.title: AVE_FETCH_LATENCY
cpu.name: Average Fetch Latency
cpu.description: AVE_FETCH_LATENCY

gpu.name: SQ_ALU_STALLED_BY_LDS

gpu.name: VALU Thread divergence in percentage

gpu.title: L2_CACHE_HIT_RATE (%)
gpu.name: L2 Cache hit rate (Percentage)

gpu.name: 64B Writes Per wave

gpu.name: Write Bandwidth in GB per second

gpu.title: EA_READ_BW (GB/sec)
gpu.name: Read Bandwidth in GB per second

cpu.title: L1_ITLB_REQUESTS (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 ITLB Requests (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 ITLB Requests, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: IC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: Instruction Cache Misses (PTI)

cpu.title: IC_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: Instruction Cache miss rate
cpu.description: The IC Miss Rate is computed as the number of number of instruction cache misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: FP_DISP_FAULTS (PTC)
cpu.name: FP_DISP_FAULTS (PTC)
cpu.description: Floating point Dispatch faults in per thousand cycles.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_L2 (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local L2 (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from local L2 cache to the core.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local Cache (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from same the cache of same CCX or cache of different CCX in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local DRAM (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote Cache (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from remote cache.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote DRAM or IO (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the different package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills.ALL (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3 cache, remote caches, local dram and remote dram.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_L2
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local L2
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local L2, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_CACHE
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local Cache
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local Cache, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_DRAM
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local DRAM
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local DRAM, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_CACHE
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote Cache
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Remote Cache, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_DRAM
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote DRAM
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Remote DRAM, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_ALL_RATE
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Rate
cpu.description: The DC refill rate is the number of DC refills from all the data sources divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_ALL_RATE
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Rate
cpu.description: The DC refill rate is the number of DC refills from all the data sources divided by the total number of retired instructions.

memory.title: SocketMemBw
memory.name: SocketMemBw
memory.expression: ( MemChARdBw + MemChBRdBw + MemChCRdBw + MemChDRdBw + MemChERdBw + MemChFRdBw + MemChGRdBw + MemChHRdBw + MemChAWrBw + MemChBWrBw + MemChCWrBw + MemChDWrBw + MemChEWrBw + MemChFWrBw + MemChGWrBw + MemChHWrBw )

memory.title: SocketMemRdBw
memory.name: SocketMemRdBw
memory.expression: ( MemChARdBw + MemChBRdBw + MemChCRdBw + MemChDRdBw + MemChERdBw + MemChFRdBw + MemChGRdBw + MemChHRdBw )

memory.title: SocketMemWrBw
memory.name: SocketMemWrBw
memory.expression: ( MemChAWrBw + MemChBWrBw + MemChCWrBw + MemChDWrBw + MemChEWrBw + MemChFWrBw + MemChGWrBw + MemChHWrBw )

cpu.title: L1_ITLB_REQUESTS (PTI)
cpu.name: L1 ITLB Requests (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 ITLB Requests, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: IC_MISSES (PTI)
cpu.name: Instruction Cache Misses (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of L1 instruction cache misses, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: IC_MISS_RATE
cpu.name: Instruction Cache miss rate
cpu.description: The IC Miss Rate is computed as the number of number of instruction cache misses divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: IC_MISS_RATIO
cpu.name: IC Miss Ratio
cpu.description: IC Miss Ratio

cpu.title: IC_FETCH_RATE
cpu.name: IC fetch rate
cpu.description: IC fetch rate

cpu.title: OP_CACHE_64B_FETCH_MISS_RATIO
cpu.name: Op Cache 64B Fetch Miss Ratio
cpu.description: Op Cache micro-tag miss ratio

cpu.title: FP_DISP_FAULTS (PTC)
cpu.name: FP_DISP_FAULTS (PTC)
cpu.description: Floating point Dispatch faults in per thousand cycles.

cpu.title: SSE_AVX_STALLS (PTC)
cpu.name: SSE_AVX_STALLS (PTC)
cpu.description: SSE AVX Dispatch Stalls.

cpu.title: RdSized (PTI)
cpu.name: RdSized (PTI)
cpu.description: Requests to L2 Data Cache Read Sized Non-Cacheable, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: RdSizedNC (PTI)
cpu.name: RdSizedNC (PTI)
cpu.description: Requests to L2 Data Cache Read Sized Non-Cacheable Non-Coherent, per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: WCB_WRITE (PTI)
cpu.name: WcbWrite PTI
cpu.description: WcbWrite per thousand retired instructions.

cpu.title: %WCB_WRITE_TO_CLOSE
cpu.name: Wcb Write to Close Percentage
cpu.description: The precentage of Write Combining Buffer Write operations to Write Combining Buffer Close operations.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_L2 (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local L2 (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from local L2 cache to the core.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local Cache (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from same the cache of same CCX or cache of different CCX in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE_LOCAL (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from External Cache Local (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from external cache to the core.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Local DRAM (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote Cache (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from remote cache.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote DRAM or IO (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the different package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Local (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3, CCX and DRAM.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_L2
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local L2
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local L2, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_CACHE
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local Cache
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local Cache, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE_LOCAL
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from External Cache Local
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from some other CCX in same node, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_DRAM
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Local DRAM
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Local DRAM, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_CACHE
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote Cache
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Remote Cache, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: %L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_DRAM
cpu.name: Percentage of Demand Data Cache Refills from Remote DRAM
cpu.description: Percentage of L1 demand data cache (DC) fills from Remote DRAM, with respect to all Data Cache accesses.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_RATE
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Local Rate
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3, CCX and DRAM.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Remote (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from Remote Node Sources like CCX and DRAM.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills from external cache (PTI)
cpu.description: DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE (PTI)

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills ALL (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of demand data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These demand DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3 cache, remote caches, local dram and remote dram.

cpu.title: L1_DEMAND_DC_REFILLS_ALL_RATE
cpu.name: Demand Data Cache Refills Rate
cpu.description: The DC refill rate is the number of DC refills from all the data sources divided by the total number of retired instructions.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_L2 (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills from Local L2 (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from local L2 cache to the core.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills from Local Cache (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from same the cache of same CCX or cache of different CCX in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE_LOCAL (PTI)
cpu.name: L1_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE_LOCAL (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from external cache to the core.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills from Local DRAM (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the same package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE_REMOTE (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills from External Cache Remote (PTI)
cpu.description: DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_CACHE (PTI)

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE_DRAM (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills from Remote DRAM or IO (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from DRAM or IO connected in the different package (node).

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills Local (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3, CCX and DRAM.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_LOCAL_RATE
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills Local Rate
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per retired instructions. These DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3, CCX and DRAM.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_REMOTE (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills Remote Node (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from Remote Node Sources like CCX and DRAM.

cpu.name: L1_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE (PTI)
cpu.description: L1_DC_REFILLS_EXTERNAL_CACHE (PTI)

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_ALL (PTI)
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills.ALL (PTI)
cpu.description: The number of data cache (DC) fills per thousand retired instructions. These DC fills are from all the data sources like Local L2/L3 cache, remote caches, local dram and remote dram.

cpu.title: L1_DC_REFILLS_ALL_RATE
cpu.name: Data Cache Refills Rate
cpu.description: The DC refill rate is the number of DC refills from all the data sources divided by the total number of retired instructions.
